Hero.name: hero1
Hero.description: Clean and minimal hero section with welcome message, subtitle, and contact button. Perfect for a straightforward introduction.

Hero.name: hero2
Hero.description: Hero section with background image overlay, personal introduction, and call-to-action button linking to work portfolio.

About.name: about1
About.description: Professional about section featuring personal introduction with key statistics cards showing projects completed, years of experience, and happy clients.

About.name: about2
About.description: Comprehensive about section with profile image, social media links, skills overview with icons, and downloadable CV button.

Skills.name: skills1
Skills.description: Interactive skills section organized in categories (Frontend, Backend, Tools) with hover tooltips and detailed descriptions for each technology.

Skills.name: skills2
Skills.description: Visual skills representation using animated progress bars with percentage levels, plus summary cards highlighting specialization areas.

Projects.name: projects1
Projects.description: Interactive project showcase with filtering tabs by category (Web Apps, Mobile, Design), hover overlays with preview/code links, and technology tags.

Projects.name: projects2
Projects.description: Pinterest-style masonry layout for projects with modal popup system for detailed project information and navigation between projects.

Testimonials.name: testimonials1
Testimonials.description: Grid layout of client testimonials featuring quote icons, client feedback, profile photos, company information, and 5-star ratings.

Contact.name: contact1
Contact.description: Classic contact section with contact information cards (email, phone, location) and fully validated contact form with error handling.

Contact.name: contact2
Contact.description: Contemporary contact design with interactive contact method cards, social media integration, and quick contact modal popup.

Footer.name: footer1
Footer.description: Comprehensive footer with brand section, quick navigation links, service listings, contact information, and social media icons with back-to-top button.

Footer.name: footer2
Footer.description: Advanced footer featuring newsletter subscription, company statistics, enhanced social media cards, contact details with availability hours, and floating visual elements.
